reviews.review: Nothing like a superhero movie that leaves the kids depressed afterward.  Marvel you make good movies and I get you need a climax etc. but come on, do we really need it that depressing?
Everything I wanted it to be. Never boring, incredibly resonant.
No words to describe how good it is
It was a great installment into a universe that defies cinema history with a bountiful collection of hilarious Superheroes. #doctorstrange

This new entry into the Marvel saga almost completely lives up to the hype that has been thrust upon it the past years. Thanos was expertly characterized and is by far my favorite antagonist within the MCU, they truly granted him a level of depth that is not common amongst any of the other Marvel villains, or in villains within the industry as a whole. However, on the whole I'm not going to be able to give the totality of my feelings towards the film until the second one is released next May. This is because I am unable to judge the effectiveness and awesomeness of the plot devices utilized in this film, until we get to view their endgame in Avengers 4. I feel that on the whole, it is a fantastic film, however, if executed correctly, the second part will blow it out of the water as it will be the culmination of the long time events involved in all 18 prior films, composed with the short term events featured in Infinity War. In my opinion, it will be very similar to that of Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1 & 2, where the first film can sometimes feel open ended, however, if produced correctly, can provide an element of closure not witnessed within the first part.

- Barclay H.

And I thought BvS was bad... undeveloped fight scenes culminating in fake deaths of characters that didn't really die and are going to be saved before their own sequels all for the sake of setting up the next Avengers movie. Pure cash grab by Disney to milk loyal MCU fans. Save your money or go see Black Panther again.

It was awesome! I am not a comic book reader @ all, so I had to do some research on the back story of this, but as a straight up action movie in the Avengers saga, this was amazing. The special effects were on point along with the ever so awesome Marvel quips and such! It was also very serious and dark in some places, so the contrast was great! By far the best Avengers movie so far! Can't wait for the conclusion next year!!!
is a supremely epic and exciting movie, with a very complex villain and fancy special effects
One of a kind. Can't wait to watch Avengers 4
